channel.title: Fred Elwell - A Life in Art
channel.description: New book about Frederick William Elwell, RA (1870—1958), better known as the artist Fred Elwell, who was an English painter and lived in Beverley, East Yorkshire. The celebratory edition of his biography by Wendy Loncaster and Malcolm Shields embraces his genius afresh.

item.title: Oxford Dictionary recognises Fred Elwell in it's National Biography
item.description: A public library ticket number works as a log in. The book Fred Elwell RA — A Life in Art is now becoming a treasured collector’s piece. Get started now.
